generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved surface with white lane markings, typical of a road where vehicles drive.
- sidewalk: The area to the left with parked bicycles and pedestrians is elevated and separated from the road, indicating a sidewalk.
- building: The large white structure with "GALERIA" signage and glass windows is clearly a building.
- wall: The beige stone wall on the right side of the image is an individual standing wall.
- pole: Several vertical poles are visible, including one with a traffic sign and others supporting the tents.
- traffic sign: A blue and white circular sign with a red cross and text "Einsatzfahrzeuge frei" is visible on the left.
- vegetation: Trees are visible in the background, particularly on the right side of the image.
- terrain: There is a small patch of grass visible on the far left side of the image.
- sky: The sky is visible in the upper left corner of the image, showing a clear blue sky.
- person: Multiple people are visible throughout the image, including pedestrians and individuals near the cars and bicycles.
- car: A black car is visible on the right side of the image, and part of a silver car is visible on the far right.
- motorcycle: A motorcycle is visible parked among the bicycles on the left side of the image.
- bicycle: Numerous bicycles are parked in rows on the left side of the image.
